title: Detective Conan Movie 21: The Crimson Love Letter
synopsis: A bombing case at Nichiuri TV in autumn. The Satsuki Cup, which crowns the winner of Japan's Hyakunin Isshu, is currently being filmed inside the facility. The incident results in a big commotion and, while the building is burning to ashes, the only people left inside are Heiji and Kazuha. They get rescued just in time by Conan, who rushes to the scene. Both the identity and purposes of the bomber are unknown.
related_anime: ['Detective Conan', 'Meitantei Conan: Karakurenai no Love Letter']
